title: Tax season’s approaching…digitize receipts, forms, and other docs with this app
content:
Macworld

2025 has arrived, which means that tax season (unfortunately) isn’t too far behind. Hate gathering all your documents and powering up your scanner just to digitize them? Ditch the clunky scanner that’s an eyesore in your office for iScanner.

This smart document-scanning app is designed to make scanning any document from your iPhone—from tax forms and driver’s licenses to handwritten notes and receipts—seamless. It even comes with AI-powered tools to help you adjust your documents for perfect scans and edit PDFs when needed, and it’s only $24.99 (reg. $199) with code SCAN.

There’s a reason why iScanner has a 4.8-star App Store rating and 1.2+ million downloads, and it’s not because it adds a smart scanner to your phone that’s super helpful once tax season arrives. This app can also help you solve tricky math problems, complete equations, and even count how many objects are in your images (handy if you’re doing home renovations or need to calculate the area from a photo).

Use code SCAN when you check out to grab this iScanner lifetime subscription for just $24.99. That’s its lowest price ever, but only until February 2 at 11:59 p.m. PT!
